Web Development Fundamentals for Beginners

This course is tailored for absolute beginners with little to no prior knowledge of web development. Explore the essentials of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and learn how to build and deploy your first simple websites.

Web Development: Building Dynamic Websites

Perfect for individuals who have a foundational understanding of web development. Dive deeper into front-end frameworks like React or Angular, explore back-end technologies like Node.js or Django, and learn to build dynamic, interactive websites with real-world functionalities. This course assumes basic knowledge and guides you to the next level in web development.
